name: Gaurav Singhal
description: Gaurav is a versatile data/social scientist, and was previously the first Lead Data Scientist at the United Nations World Food Programme

name: Dr Laurence E. Day
description: Laurence is a PhD in computer science from the University of Nottingham, and a software engineer specialising in functional programming and program correctness

name: Nupur Joshi
